SELECT A.MENU_ID AS MENU_ID, A.PARENTMENU_ID, A.MENU_NM, A.ORDER_NO, A.USE_YN, B.PROGRAM_URL, B.PROGRAM_NM, SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH( A.MENU_ID, '>' ) AS PATH, LEVEL FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT MENU_ID, PARENTMENU_ID, MENU_NM, ORDER_NO, USE_YN FROM TB_MENU START WITH MENU_ID IN ( SELECT DISTINCT B.MENU_ID FROM TB_ROLE_PROGRAM A INNER JOIN TB_PROGRAM B ON A.PROGRAM_ID = B.PROGRAM_ID AND A.MNGR_GRP_ID = #{mngrGrpId} ) CONNECT BY PRIOR PARENTMENU_ID = MENU_ID ) A LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_PROGRAM B ON A.MENU_ID = B.MENU_ID AND B.ST_PROGRAM_YN = 'Y' START WITH A.PARENTMENU_ID = (SELECT MENU_ID FROM TB_MENU WHERE PARENTMENU_ID = 'TOP') CONNECT BY PRIOR A.MENU_ID = A.PARENTMENU_ID ORDER SIBLINGS BY A.ORDER_NO
SELECT TP.MENU_ID AS MENU_ID , TP.PROGRAM_URL , TP.PROGRAM_NM , TP.ST_PROGRAM_YN FROM TB_ROLE_PROGRAM TRP INNER JOIN TB_PROGRAM TP ON TRP.PROGRAM_ID = TP.PROGRAM_ID AND TRP.MNGR_GRP_ID = #{mngrGrpId}

SELECT A.MENU_ID ,A.MENU_NM ,A.ORDER_NO ,A.PARENTMENU_ID , B.MENU_ID AS ROLE_MENU_ID FROM ( SELECT MENU_ID AS MENU_ID , MENU_NM , ORDER_NO , PARENTMENU_ID FROM TB_MENU START WITH PARENTMENU_ID = 'TOP' CONNECT BY PRIOR MENU_ID = PARENTMENU_ID ORDER SIBLINGS BY ORDER_NO ) A LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_ROLE_MENU B ON A.MENU_ID = B.MENU_ID AND B.MNGR_GRP_ID = #{mngrGrpId}

SELECT URL_TP , LOGIN_URL , MENU_ID AS MENU_ID FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT MENU_ID , PARENTMENU_ID , URL_TP , LOGIN_URL FROM TB_MENU START WITH MENU_ID IN ( SELECT DISTINCT B.MENU_ID FROM TB_ROLE_PROGRAM A INNER JOIN TB_PROGRAM B ON A.PROGRAM_ID = B.PROGRAM_ID AND A.MNGR_GRP_ID = #{mngrGrpId} ) CONNECT BY PRIOR PARENTMENU_ID = MENU_ID ) WHERE PARENTMENU_ID = 'TOP'

SELECT MENU_ID AS MENU_ID , MENU_NM , PARENTMENU_ID , MENU_DEPTH , ORDER_NO , REG_ID , REG_DT , UPD_ID , UPD_DT , USE_YN , LEVEL FROM TB_MENU START WITH PARENTMENU_ID = 'TOP' CONNECT BY PRIOR MENU_ID = PARENTMENU_ID ORDER SIBLINGS BY ORDER_NO
